description:
Owen, Morphe, and Phoebe look into Grea and Lecia`s dreams, only to find their imagination running wild!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Repaint the Dragoness / Swift as the Wind! Mysteria Friends! / Orderly Dreams
Repaint the Ryuu Hime / Hayate! Manaria Friends / Chitsujo no Yume
リペイント・ザ・竜姫 / 疾風! マナリアフレンズ / 秩序の夢
